TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3162=There are outstanding changes not yet made by the legislation.gov.uk editorial team to Statutory Water Companies Act 1991. Any changes that have already been made by the team appear in the content and are referenced with annotations.}
textBeforeTable: = The Water Act 1989 (c. 15) 1989 = The Water Act 1945 (c. 42) 1945 Note: The following abbreviations are used in this Table:— Table of DerivationsE+W Act repealed by 2015 c. 20 Sch. 23 para. 27 This section lists the changes and effects yet to be applied to the whole Act, associated Parts and Chapters where applicable. This includes any insertions of whole new Parts, Chapters or provisions yet to be inserted into this Act. These effects are included in this view as they may be (but won’t necessarily be) relevant to the specific provision that you are viewing.
